The world’s most eligible billionaire bachelor is wrapped around your finger, while the flirtatious, blockbuster actor-turned-host uses his Hollywood charm to ‘turn up the heat’ once the cameras stop rolling. But when a mysterious, heavy hearted research scientist crosses your path with a dire warning, all hell breaks loose. As paradise unexpectedly falls and a zombie outbreak ravages the island, will you be able to lead three men to safety and still accomplish your mission?

name: Sim Settlements 2
description: A sequel to the popular Sim Settlements mod, containing three chapters with dozens of fully voiced characters and storylines based around a deeply expanded settlement building system.

name: Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney - Trials After Justice
description:
Set between Ace Attorney: Justice for All and Trails and Tribulations. In Phoenix Wright Ace Attorney ‘Trials after Justice’ Phoenix and Maya continue to help those in need by defending them. Along the way, they come across a new prosecutor named Luis Hawk, who seems to have it in for Phoenix. (Don’t they all?) During these trials, Phoenix learns about his new rival. Is he a friend or foe to justice?

Originally intended to be 4 cases, but cancelled after 3 was finished.

name: Real Drone Simulator
description:
RDS is a realistic drone simulator which is focusing on FPV drones at the moment including freestyle and racing. The simulator is based on real life physics formulas and includes existing drones and parts with the cooperation of manufacturers.
Learn to fly FPV or just have fun RDS is free for personal use.

name: Grim Dawn: Fangs of Asterkarn
description: In this latest massive installment of Grim Dawn, you will journey West into the rugged wilderness of Asterkarn and contend with the mighty Kurn. Discover the dark legacy that continues to haunt these nomadic people and again drives them East, towards renewed conflict.

name: Fate of the Foxes
description: Legend tells of three fox brothers who once protected your town and were worshipped as gods, until one day, they turned on humankind. Desperate, the townsfolk called on Inari, god of foxes, to save them. Her response was to grant a local girl the power to bring the three unruly deities to heel. Or so they say…

name: Psychic Supernatural Boyfriend
description: You’re fresh out of the detective academy and ready for your first assignment. Thanks to your acute ability to sense the supernatural, you’re tasked with hunting down your first demon alongside a veteran detective.

name: Welcome to the Yokai Inn
description: A quest to save your father whisks you away to the doorstep of Sankiya Inn, the most famous ryokan in the yokai world. There, you broker a deal with the handsome oni owner to work in exchange for room and board, and soon find yourself training under a friendly bakeneko coworker and mingling with otherworldly guests, including a mysterious ronin…

name: Supernatural Nightlife Lovers
description: When a big-shot gangster shows up at your family restaurant to collect a debt, you're forced to moonlight at an underground club to pay it all back. Little did you know you’d be working in a neon sanctuary for supernatural beings looking to escape their human lives. While learning the ropes, you meet a salacious pure-blood vampire who’s been a regular for over 200 years, butt heads with a grumpy Lycan manager, and help steer a street-smart dhampir ruffian toward his dream career as an aspiring chef. Can you settle into your freakishly new normal or will your heroic plan go bust?

name: Pirate Lords of Love
description: Your life in a seaside town has been peaceful but dull—until an infamous, wealthy samurai suitor approaches you one day and asks for your hand in marriage. As a wedding gift, he gives you a magnificent black pearl necklace. After your father dies of a sudden illness, distant relatives eagerly arrange the union, despite your misgivings.

name: High School Secret Romance
description: Life as a teenager is already hard, but thanks to the mountain of debt left behind by your estranged mother, you and your father can barely make ends meet. Luckily, one of your father's connections offers you a spot at a prestigious high school that could change everything. But there's a catch—it’s an all-boys school, and you’ll need to pose as a boy to avoid getting kicked out!

name: Kiss Me, Kill Me
description: Working for a contract-killing agency has been nothing but grunt work so far, but at last, you’re about to hit the big time. Your next target promises to be an easy mark, and then you and your sickly little brother will be set for life… or so you thought.

name: Demonic Suitors
description: You have just received an invitation to a prestigious school and are on your way when your chauffeur takes a sudden turn into a dark tunnel! You’re certain this must be a mistake but after the bumpy ride, you’re greeted by a devilishly handsome young man who calls you “princess.” Just one thing, though—he’s got horns on his head! If there’s one thing the school failed to inform you, it’s that the school is for demons.

name: Full Moon Mafia
description: You’re on your way home, full moon lighting your way, when you’re suddenly attacked by a wolf-like creature leaving you with a nasty bite. But before it can cause any further damage, you’re saved by two handsome men, who also seem to be part wolf! You quickly recognize them as part of the local mob, the Bloodhounds.

name: Dark Samurai Avengers
description: Rumors of the Black Hole Sun Prophecy, an era of endless darkness, spread as several towns and cities are blotted out by an eclipse. Your beloved father, a top shogun, and brother have been slain in battle by General Benki—an evil warlord rumored to dabble in the dark arts.

name: Monstrous Cravings
description: Amidst a city plagued by consumption and vampires, you seek to uncover the truth behind your brother's disappearance. But as you investigate, you’re suddenly whisked away by a distinguished vampire gentleman to join a secret organization. The group seems to be fighting against the darkness, but the question remains—as a creature of the night, can this man really be trusted?

name: Apartment Love Triangle
description: You’ve found the perfect apartment… The only problem is, it’s for couples only! Navigate your way through the crazy antics of a new city, a new job, and an unexpected love triangle—with four gorgeous bachelors to choose from, you'll never have a dull moment! Will you be able to keep up with the drama and find your true love?

name: Married to the Mafia
description: One evening, you’re invited by your uncle to an engagement dinner for a famous local mafia boss—but then a handsome stranger pulls you on stage and reveals that his new fiancée is you!

name: Love at Any Cost
description: You’ve always put your work before your love life, so when your younger sister announces her engagement, you need to find a date ASAP! Luckily, you find a service that provides just what you’re looking for—a handsome, wealthy businessman. But when you discover that your rental boyfriend is hiding something, will you be able to keep up the charade? Can a fake relationship lead to real love?

name: Servants of the Night
description: After waking up in the forest with a head injury and no memories, you follow the moonlit path to a nearby mansion. To your surprise and confusion, the three handsome butlers greet you as if they’ve been awaiting your return! Apparently, you’re the mistress of the household who disappeared some years back.

name: Bloodlust Rebellion
description: In a vampire-ruled post-apocalyptic world, join the rebellion to overthrow the iron-fisted Vampire King Xavier and his corrupt reign. Guided by the charismatic Gideon, navigate a perilous landscape filled with supernatural creatures and ancient artifacts, including the mind-controlling device, The Nexus. With your loyal childhood friend and battle-hardened partner, Thorne, face the challenges of the rebellion and ignite a forbidden connection with the enigmatic vampire, Elric, that tests your beliefs and fuels your desire for revolution.

name: Millionaire Monster Penthouse
description: You’ve just landed a new job in the city in a luxurious penthouse, free condo included! It’s a job anyone would die for. The building is opulent, the location—prime, and all the residents look like they just walked out of a fashion magazine.

name: Genius Supernatural Romance
description: Enjoy sizzling-hot and dangerously spicy stories of romance with devils, grim reapers and immortals! Make exciting decisions throughout the story to enjoy your very own unique experience! These are 3 of our best supernatural romance titles for you to enjoy as a bundle with reduced costs! Who will you choose to be your supernatural lover...?

name: Bloodworth Academy Occult Club
description: After rebelling one too many times, your parents have enrolled you in a prestigious, secluded boarding school, hoping to set you straight. However, you quickly discover that your new campus is a playground for the supernatural. As if that wasn't surprising enough, you're forced by the school's rigorous rules to join a club or risk expulsion. Thankfully, the newly-established occult club offers you a spot, conditional on proving your worth.

name: Midnight Serenade
description: Step into the vibrant, sultry world of Crescent City, where music, mystery, and magic collide. As a talented but struggling jazz singer, you face an impossible choice to save your ailing father by striking a desperate bargain at the crossroads with a devil by the name of Lucian Cross, a seductive music producer with a dark secret.

name: Inferno’s Embrace
description: Embark on a journey to Wyverndale Academy, where you’ll uncover a hidden society of dragon hybrids and confront secrets that blur the line between humanity and magic. As dark forces rise, team up with dragons Niko, Vidar, and Dravon to navigate a world torn between peaceful coexistence and looming dominance. Embrace your unique power, balance loyalty and duty, and rewrite your destiny!

name: Enchanted Hearts
description: After witnessing a handsome stranger in peril, you rush to save him, only to unleash a magical power you never knew you had. Little did you know, you're actually part of a bloodline of powerful witches and warlocks. Soon after, you receive an invitation to attend Nocturne Academy, a school for supernatural beings, to help you master your newfound abilities. However, you soon find yourself caught in the middle of an ancient feud between werewolves and vampires.

name: My Hotel Romance
description: Sin descripción

name: Love's Eternal Wishes
description: You’re a gifted Wisher with a mysterious past, embark on a journey to uncover the truth behind your unique powers. Along the way, you'll form deep connections with a diverse cast of characters, including the enigmatic Prince Asher, the compassionate Rowan, and the rugged protector Stone. As you navigate a world filled with ancient curses, dark secrets, and powerful magic, you'll grapple with questions of identity, redemption, and the true nature of love. With each wish granted and each memory uncovered, you'll inch closer to unraveling the mysteries that bind your fate to those around you.

name: Faded Melodies
description: Enjoy a musical odyssey of love and transformation at Harmony Heights Academy. As a former virtuoso violinist turned junior high music teacher, you'll navigate the echoes of a tragic accident and meet three captivating men: Ryota, the competitive pianist; Eiji, the enigmatic cellist; and Takumi, the eccentric composer. Your decisions will harmonize love, rivalry, and personal growth in this symphony of destiny.

name: Demonic Crusade
description: As a humble seamstress eking out a living in these fog-drenched streets, you’ve always sought something more, and the recent string of murders only reinforces how fleeting life can be. When the most eligible bachelor in the city promises to grant your greatest wish, you barely have time to count your blessings before fate intervenes and reveals that his offer is actually a contract for your soul!

name: Star Scandal
description: As a newbie photojournalist, the glittering world of the rich and famous seems impossibly out of reach, but all that is about to change. Not even one day into your job, you suddenly find yourself rubbing shoulders with the crème de la crème of the celebrity world alongside the very hands-on CEO of your agency. Knowing who is trying to butter you up and who genuinely holds your best interests at heart could be the difference between rising to the top or being savaged in the latest news cycle.

name: Desires of a Vampire
description: Your days are spent as a simple maid in service to a powerful vampire lord. Luckily, the lord you serve is kind and gentle with you, as long as you let him drink your blood. Just as your relationship with your lord begins to move beyond professional, your beautiful estate is stormed by angry vampire hunters. At first, the leader of the group thinks you’re just another trapped human, but then he realizes you have a secret that runs through your veins…

name: Girl Who Cried Wolf
description: Breaking news! A werewolf-like beast has been attacking the city, and the Lunar Ledger wants you on the case! Eager to overcome your rookie status, you’re excited to make headlines alongside the paper’s star journalist, your sexy new CEO, and the charming politician at the heart of the scoop, but then you discover that your new team might be more wild than they let on…

name: Twilight Host Club
description: When a new vampire-themed host club opens up nearby, your college roommate immediately wants to go. Though you're hesitant at first, you soon find you quite enjoy being waited on by the ‘unliving’ staff. But things take a dark turn when you cut your finger and the hosts’ reactions get a bit too real…

name: The Princess in the Mirror
description: From Voltage's famous interactive romance series comes the glitzy, fairy tale world of The Princess in the Mirror!

name: Sleepless Cinderella: Party
description:
Become the heroine in a modern time fairytale!
Make your dream celebrity fall in love with Voltage’s new dating sim. Enjoy the new and improved user interface and choose your virtual boyfriend from a group of incredibly handsome celebrities!

name: Shop of Forgotten Memories
description:
When your beloved grandmother passes away under mysterious circumstances, you’re left to pick up the pieces of her legacy.

But this is no regular family inheritance—instead, you find yourself the brand-new owner of an antique shop filled to the brim with unique and exotic artifacts.

name: Fairy Boyfriend
description: In this interactive romance Otome story choice game, the one in control of the romantic story is you! You have multiple option as to how the story will go.

name: Animal Zodiac
description: In this game, you tap the screen to drop an animal, then keep matching the same animals to make them bigger and aim for a high score.

name: Ayakashi & Sweets
description: The Mysterious Ayakashi and the Sweets Shops: A Love Story is a romance game for women. The game plays like reading a novel. You continue to read the story, you make choices, and simply enjoy a romantic relationship with a great male character of your choosing.

name: Anime Story Otome Game: Comino
description: Sin descripción

name: Switch! Love Over Flowers
description: Ever since your mother fell ill, you’ve spent your days working at a flower shop to pay her bills. Your life is simple, but you find it fulfilling, until one day, a customer comes in who turns your life upside down.

name: Child of Ruin
description:
In this narrative RPG, you join Ravi and their two companion spirits in their quest across the Echoing Isles found high in the sky.

Experience an emotional journey governed by calamity in an attempt to recover your lost memories.

But remember... you must pay the price of your choices in full.

name: Vows of Eternity
description: You are an aspiring writer hoping to get into university. You leave the comforts of the countryside to pursue your studies, but getting a scholarship seems a lot harder than you’ve imagined! Even with a part-time job at a quaint cafe, you’re barely making ends meet, and the dream of getting a college degree seems to be slipping away from your grasp.

name: Spotlight: Choose Your Romance
description: A brand new interactive story game with top of the line animation featuring stories from the authors you love!

name: Where's Tess
description: Where's Tess is an offline adventure story in the visual novel genre in the style of anime and sim game about becoming the ultimate travel blogger and influencer.

name: Kirby Bowl 64
description: A cancelled sequel for Kirby's Dream Course. It became Kirby's Air Ride, before being finally released as Kirby Air Ride.

name: Floodbound
description: Your goal is to travel through three large areas in the rainy world while dodging Drain Face and his abilities. This is the neutral ending, though you are still killed and you become the next Drain Face (big lore). There's also a good ending, where you collect the souls of your victims (which are represented as glowing glass balls), use them to defeat Drain Face and move into the afterlife with the victims. And lastly, a bad ending, where you actually find your own car in the parallel world's version of the river, along with your body floating inside it. If you have collected the victims' souls by this point, you can physically throw them to smash open the window of your car, which wakes you up in the real world, giving you an unfair second chance at living while destroying the souls of your victims. An ugly, immoral loophole.

name: Unending Dawn
description: The anime open-world action RPG "Unending Dawn" under development by Chinese studio Parcae’s Fate Studio. it will launch for PlayStation 5, iOS and Android.

name: Rollerball
description: Sin descripción

name: Hämmeri
description: Sin descripción

name: Jim & Dill
description: Sin descripción

name: One More Encounter
description:
On November 17, 1992, a small group of three developers released a video game like no other. Only available for the NEC PC-9801 computer, this was the most ambitious game the industry had ever conceived. Unfortunately, it was a sales failure and was lost in the abyss of time.

More than 30 years later, One More Encounter (a.k.a OME) has been partially revived. One More Encounter was a dungeon crawler where the important thing was not the motif, but the journey itself and the characters we encountered along the way. Unfortunately, only 0.35% of the total game could be saved. That is, of the more than two thousand possible encounters in the game, this version only contains seven.

Be that as it may, this is a look at a world that could have been, an industry that never really took hold, and a type of videogame that, so many years later, we are still struggling to make.

name: Leo The Lost Kitten
description: Help Leo escape all monsters and find his way back home to his owner after getting lost.

name: Mathshot
description:
Learn Add, Subtract, Multiply & Divide. Increase your brain power with an excellent educational game for learning mathmatics for children and adults of all ages.
Improve your math thinking and coordination quickly and fun with Math Shot.

name: PC Calcio 7.0
description: Managerial football game highly appreciated in the 90s created by Dinamic Multimedia srl and sponsored by the Italian Footballers' Association AIC

name: Tetsudou-ou Neo
description: Sin descripción

name: Milano'd
description: Milano’d an interactive, text-based game that plunges players into the murky depths of corporate intrigue at a multinational corporation known for its glamorous facade and secretive dealings. As the newest employee, you are thrust into the annual Mega Raffle, an event surrounded by rumors of corruption and manipulation. Navigate through a web of deceit as you decide whether to expose the wrongdoing, exploit it for personal gain, or simply try to survive your day-to-day corporate life. Your choices will lead you through conversations with allies and adversaries alike, uncovering secrets that could alter the course of your career and the integrity of MilanoCorp. Each decision shapes the narrative, leading to multiple outcomes based on your moral compass and strategic cunning. Can you unravel the truth without losing yourself in the process?

name: Ace VR Shooting
description:
Experience shooting like never before.

Ace combines cutting-edge Virtual Reality with a stunningly realistic handset to transform your shooting.

name: Crazy Kart 2
description:
This is an online racing car game that has become popular in China, Hong Kong, India, the Philippines, Thailand, and Vietnam. In the Philippines, this game is the largest casual online game with a following exceeding 1 million players.

In this game, players compete with millions of others from all over Indonesia. Crazy Kart offers various racing tracks and diverse vehicle types. Using cute characters, gamers can select fantasy tracks such as outer space, fairy cities, or modern roads like those in China, America, or Formula 1 races. Crazy Kart also provides hundreds of types of cars to choose from, ranging from sedans, jeeps, buses, trucks, race cars, SUVs, and other cool cars. This game was officially accessible starting from April 2009.

name: Microsoft Solitaire
description: A port of Microsoft Solitaire included in Windows Mobile.

name: Microsoft Minesweeper
description: A port of Microsoft Minesweeper for Windows Mobile.

name: Funkin' at Freddy's + Afton Full Week
description: Funkin' at Freddy's is a mod we've made with a lot of passion and respect to the original series of Five Nights at Freddy's and contains 10 songs in its base-release, with six of these songs are unlocked through various means with varying visuals. If you get stuck with trying to figure out how to unlock characters take a peek at the strategy guide image that's included in the files.

name: Bylina: Lure of the Sorceress
description: Gather your party, and venture forth to the Kholodny Bay! Explore the wide open wilderness and dozens of dastardly dungeon levels, face hundreds of different monsters inspired by slavic mythology, and have fun storming the castle of the evil Sorceress!

name: The Kotchei
description: In the Kotchei you play as a undead lord risen from the dead to destroy the Order, an evil theocracy. Craft spells and powerful items, summon minions to fight alongside you, build up your keep and rob graves for more material for your research.

name: The Tale of Marena's Deft
description: You are Marena, the spirit of death. You have spent many nights chasing a demon-queen Dukljana the Deathless, climbing to the very heights of Mount Troyan. If you can't stop her, she will steal the sun itself and who knows what will happen to the world then! Inspired by Touhou games (especially the early ones) and Slavic folk mythology.

name: Salvatorem
description: Fight Slavic mythological bosses in this closed-world RPG

name: Cyyer
description: Face the horrors alone as you fight for survival in Cyyer

name: Collectors Cove
description: Set sail on a cozy farming adventure aboard your boat in Collector's Cove. Explore diverse climate zones with your animal companion and discover a multitude of rare crops and fish. Enjoy cozy solitude while completing your Collector's compendium and rise to the rank of a Named Collector.

name: AquaBlitz: Alien Racer
description: Race against each other in 3 dimensions under water, choose to race as human, alien or atlantean. Choose and mod your racer with weapons. On the track find boosts and other items, avoid the obstacles, take shortcuts and shoot your way to be the first over the finishing line.

name: Hand of Seasons
description: Hand of Seasons is an otherworldly, card-based journey set in the nordic plains. You are The Apprentice. Traverse the winterclad wilds and bring back balance between the four seasons. Craft your deck, discover synergies, and find artifacts as you embark on this spellbinding adventure!

name: DDI Touring Car Championship
description: Inspired by 90s classic arcade racing games DDI Touring Car Championship delivers super fast gameplay with a Hyper Techno soundtrack.

name: Deep Dish Dungeon
description: Co-op online multiplayer game where you must unite to survive the treacherous depths of a mysterious dungeon, navigate puzzling passageways and gather resources to improve your camping site. Encounter enemies with diverse behaviors, discover coveted treasures, and unravel enigmas within its depths.

name: Enough with the Witch
description: Destroy the evil witch that contaminated the region and cursed their happy habitants to convert them into horrible (but cute) monsters. This auto attacker with deck building mechanics to customize your character presents a casual game, frenetic and fun, full of magic and adventure.

name: Exceed Gear
description: A 2D rogue-lite anime action game, focused on combos and freedom of expression. Build synergistic combos through mind-blowing modifiers and combat upgrades each run. Fight through hordes of Valkyries and become the savior of the E.X.C.E.E.D program!

name: Legends of Aden
description: Legends of Aden is a Western fantasy style MMORPG featuring intense monster battles and treasure hunts, clan assemblies, field bosses, and thrilling PvP combat. With an open trading system driven by players, danger and opportunity coexist. Come gather wealth, make allies, and dominate the realm.

name: Last Summer
description: Last Summer is a single-player third-person adventure set in the Lost Alpine Mountains, where you will go through the challenges of a young adult, turning into their own person. Climb, Explore and rediscovery what has been lost in the Lost Alpine.

name: Into the V.O.I.D.
description: Board your spaceship and delve Into the VOID, facing waves of relentless enemies. Grow stronger with each battle to overcome Zentharian commanders and their “Bullet-Hell” attack patterns. This top-down roguelike shooter promises short but intense runs where your wits and reflexes will be tested.

name: HyperPop
description: Living in a dystopian corporate world has driven R-054 (Rosa) to her limits. After having an altercation with the law, use your new cybernetic enchantments to run, jump, and grapple your way to freedom from the oppressive Corporatocracy. This game will challenge you to go faster than ever before!

name: One: Secret Empire
description: Join Kain, Omega-7’s last survivor, uncovering secrets on an SCP Federation asteroid. Unravel the truth, endure chaos, and delve into a conspiracy that could reshape SCP history in this sci-fi thriller.

name: Norah's Song
description: Norah's Song: This first-person psychological horror plunges you into a nightmare. Immerse yourself in a haunting past, desperately seeking answers. Each discovery threatens your sanity, chilling you to the core. Can you survive the darkness long enough to find redemption?

name: Nora: Forest Nights
description: Take control of our intrepid hero as you take Nora on a camping trip for the weekend. While on the trip, you'll convince Nora that it is of vital importance to follow certain, rules!

name: Neighbor's Wife
description: Your neighbor is always busy and doesn't have much time to spend with his wife, which makes her feel lonely and sad. You are the only one who can save their marriage!

name: My Little RPG Shop
description: A 3D simulation maganement game

name: Sleep Swimmer
description: Sleep Swimmer is a narrative adventure game where you play as Aria, an anxious girl who escapes her overstimulating world by visiting an underwater town full of salamander people in her dreams. Swim around and collect sounds, mix them on your DJ set, and make salamander friends!

name: Project Silverfish
description: Navigate around dangerous anomalies to uncover powerful artifacts. Sneak past, fight or manipulate enemies with a diverse set of tools and weapons. Overcome daunting environmental hazards to press deeper into a hostile and mysterious exclusion zone...

name: Queen's Loyalty
description: Gather monster queens and rebuild your castle. You must take back your power and hold them accountable for not honoring the peace agreement.

name: Ray
description: Dive into the immersive depths of RAY, an eerie dystopian deep-sea adventure. Locate hidden items to witfully solve physics based puzzles. Navigate the abandoned station with stealth as vicious predators roam the abyss. If spotted; Hide!

name: Terminal Defense
description: The only tower defense game in the world that is played in the terminal. I didn't make this game because it was a good idea, I made it because I thought it was cool.

name: Tearfallen
description: Rise against the Origins of Primorden! Join forces and embark on Expeditions in a dynamic Online Action Roguelite Adventure. Fight intense battles, and make choices that unveil part of your story, defining your path in this epic saga.

name: The Last Mission
description: The Last Mission is an auto-battler and space battle simulation game where you command a fleet of spacecraft in vast, strategic battles. Equip, configure and upgrade them to be ready to battle the enemy.

name: The Witch's Redemption
description: Step into a world shrouded in mystery and peril in “The Witch’s Redemption,” an RPG teeming with narrative depth and strategic intrigue. Unravel the mysteries that hold Alice captive through captivating dialogues, thrilling battles, and cunning investigations.

name: The Ramen Stand
description: The Ramen Stand is a ramen simulator horror game based on a ramen stand.

name: Zavod: Conveyor Logic
description: ZAVOD is a minimalist puzzle game focused on setting up conveyor line operations.

name: Weekend Hentai
description: Are you ready to unleash your charm and embark on a thrilling weekend filled with passion, excitement, and unforgettable moments? Get ready to experience "Weekend Hentai" and discover where your desires will lead you!

name: Unlimited Worlds
description: 类roguelite的无限流3D像素游戏

name: Uncanny Labyrinth
description: Uncanny Labyrinth is a limited space survival game that uniquely combines the characteristics of survival, horror, puzzle solving and maze adventure games. Players will wake up in the center of a complex maze without any clues. Let's try to see if they can survive and escape from this strange maze.

name: Celestium
description: An open world survival game set in space.

name: Ouch! So Many Beauties!
description: The player transforms into the male lead "Lu Ming" and meets six beautiful women with vastly different styles. They may be pure schoolgirls, high cold models, hot OL, anime cute girls, pure love daughters, tender female teachers..

name: Dream of the Limbo
description: "Dream of the Limbo," is a 2D platform action game centered around "swooping." You will continuously navigate through space, avoiding relentless attacks from enemies and eliminating them.

name: Mirko Polo
description: A fascinating adventure telling a wonderful, touching story

name: BackRooms's 1995 The Lost Footage: Chapter 1
description: My name is Jacob i am 25 years old I heard there was a lot of rumor's that if find this abandoned house you start to see things but i am here to Find my brother, He went missing sometime in January of 1970 Missing posters my brother was one of them.

name: Megdan
description:
It is that time of the year again when mighty Slavic gods of Light and Darkness gather to determine who is the most powerful of them all.

And you are invited!

Pledge yourself to one of the Great Powers and take control over 3 epic heroes slugging it out with the enemy god's champion and their heroes.

name: 2D Solomonar's Apprentice
description: She is not yet trained in the solomonar way, nor she has a dragon to ride against the dark spawn but her crocodile pet Costel has an idea!

name: Fat-Frumos & The Solomonar
description: Short Game for Vianu Game Jam

name: Solomonaris
description: Discover the mythological legend of The Solomonari in this adventure story-rich game. You will play from 2 different perspectives and unveil the mystery of Father Iancu, his son Ptolomeu and Solomon. Featuring stunning graphics, beautiful voice lines and 4 different levels for over 15 minutes of gameplay.

name: My Hamster Pet
description: your virtual hamster friend

name: B3ndy
description: Sin descripción

name: Waffle
description: Waffle is a daily word game of letters and logic. Rearrange the letters to solve the words. The top score is awarded for solving the puzzle in the least number of moves.

name: Arfgaldt
description: Argaldt (アルフガルド) is a text-based role-playing adventure published by ASCII in 1984.

name: Demon Island
description: Sin descripción

name: Happy Zoo
description: Sin descripción

name: Hero Saga
description: Sin descripción

name: Woman Guerrillero
description: Sin descripción

name: Romance of Bousouzoku
description: Sin descripción

name: A Q Serial Gun
description: Later released on Sega Genesis

name: Dinosaur War
description: Sin descripción

name: Slavic Feast
description: In the game players (up to 4) reinact roles during slavic feast of commemoration (also known as "Dziady"). By summoning and satisfying the needs of lost souls, players get rewarded by completing soul's wishes in given time. If they fail to do so, they shall be punished.

name: Dark as Blood
description:
Dark as Blood is a short, text-based horror game inspired by Slavic folklore by Masha Lepire and Eugene Fasano.

Close the sidebar, put on headphones, and make the game full screen for a more immersive experience.

name: The Wonderful Life of Koshchei
description: A visual novel based on Koshchei from Slavic folklore who is living peacefully.

name: Who Axed You?
description: Slay the weather wizards and their dragons because they bothered you as Vasile, an axe throwing drunk peasant! This game is based on the Romanian myth about solomonars and dragons.

name: Kupala Night
description: Text quest in the genre of Slavic fantasy.

name: Avetinja
description: Avetinja (pronounced ə-ve-tɪ-njɑ:) is a puzzle roguelike RPG inspired by Serbian and Slavic myth. Players take on the role of one of three classes as they fight their way through various monsters, hoping to reach the castle that's "neither in the sky nor on the earth" and defeat the dreaded Avetinja.

name: Before The After
description: Before The After (by David Irimia & Daniel Hristescu) is an escape-room-like game where you play as a soul stuck in the afterlife of the Great Passing. In the afterworld, you will play out the lore of the Romanian purgatory as told by folklore stories.

name: One Good Turn Deserves Another
description: The game is based on the "Solomonar" myth from Romanian folklore. Solomonars are wizards, blessed with the power of controlling the weather. It is said that each Solomonar is able to control a Balaur, a giant winged snake, which has the ability to enhance their already supernatural powers. One legend states that these wizards travel from village to village, usually dressed as beggars, and ask for food or shelter. Denying their request will bring bad weather over the village, but they also offer rewards to those who help.

name: Paradise Tycoon
description: Build your paradise, have fun with friends & become ultimate tycoon in Paradise Tycoon's multiplayer world!

name: Out of Sight
description: Out of Sight is an urban fantasy story-driven 2D adventure game inspired by Slavic mythology. Set in the present of the decaying mining town in the Mostecko region, archaeology student Nela has to use her wit and knowledge to uncover the truth behind the strange occurrences.

name: Boog Doodles
description: Boog Doodles is a chill narrative game about a young artist on her journey to draw all the fantastic bugs in the land of Slava.

name: Baltic Folk
description: Immerse in Baltic folklore, manage a cozy tavern, and craft epic tales. Join us on a whimsical journey!

name: Pawn Legends
description: It is time to make the dream a reality! -Name's Mick, and you have a Pawn Shop on your hands, located at the beautiful Sunset Bay. Restore, Expand, Renovate, Manage and Grow your Shop to become the #1 business on this island!

name: Néro & Sci ∫ Integral Edition
description: Solve the mysteries of this logical world and enter the captivating world of Néro and Sci.

name: Touhou: Dreams of a Sunflower
description: Touhou meets Dark Souls. A 3D bullet hell soulslike fangame about exploring dreams and tending to flowers.

name: The Clown's Forest: Fear of a Survivor
description: Sarah Baines somehow survived the trap in that basement. She is trapped in the collapsed house of horrors in Hartown Amusement Park, and Chester is relentlessly pursuing her. But something dark is manifesting around her. Can she survive the horrors?

name: Scrap Collector
description: In Scrap Collector collect, combine, and automate card production. Make your robot empire and take on the enemies of the overgrown and mutated earth.

name: Scrollden
description: Home-building meets nurturing mythological creatures.

name: Uberich: Advent Sinners
description: The elusive shadow, the horrifying tunnel, the assassin, the haunted ruin, the High-orbit Space Station, the Creators, the Power Words, the religious wars, and the organization that only exist in Annie's words. What kind of future will it create when these seemingly irrelevant pieces come together?

name: Diegesis of The Ruined
description: A dark Christian-based post-apocalyptic survival card game, that is a retelling about the last community of survivors who were traveling the lands trying to survive and constantly seeking a safe place from the horrors that have come upon the earth, which were born from the sins of humanity.

name: Descent: The Dark Corridors
description: Terror, chases and terrifying creatures in this atmospheric horror game. But no matter what happens, never be left alone in the dark.

name: Celebrity Hunter
description: The most ambitious indie adult VN with 70+ hours of gameplay! Live your hottest fantasies with 9 main characters (and dozens of others) in 3,500+ 4k scenes. Create your cinematic story with 2,100+ impactful choices and over 30 endings! After 3 mi downloads in Brazil, CH comes to seduce you!

name: Capibara Lost Dream
description: Enjoy the story of Frank and his adventure to escape from an island dominated by a cult of humanoid Capybaras, fight, explore, have sex and meet lots of fun characters!

name: Critical Upload
description: Embark on a fast-paced action journey through space, discovering new weapons and abilities through acquisition and research to better each run. Invite friends to experience it with you!

name: Dead Crossway Zompell Survival Zombie
description: "Zompell Survival Zombie" on Steam pits players against waves of undead. Earn XP to unlock spells, compete on leaderboards, and anticipate updates and multiplayer. Survive the apocalypse in "Zompell Survival Zombie."

name: Aetherise
description: You are created as a new soul directly from the Aether, you don't know why you're here or what you're supposed to do. As you start exploring the world, you start making up choices for yourself, and eventually decide how the world around you will evolve with you.

name: Alien Garden
description: Welcome to Alien Garden, a fast-paced first person roguelike with permadeath mechanics, unique class abilities, randomly generated dungeons, intense boss fights, multiplayer online bullet-hell and a vibrant player-based economy. Join the battle now!

name: Eternis: Death Match
description:
Eternis: Death Match, the ultimate arena where ancient legends and futuristic technology collide in heart-pounding battles!
Choose from a roster of iconic characters like Cleopatra and Isaac Newton, each with their own unique abilities and playstyles. Engage in intense one-on-one duels, thrilling tournaments, and epic guild wars as you climb the ranks to become a legend in your own right.

Explore dynamic environments, hone your skills, and discover new strategies in this ever-evolving battlefield. With regular updates, new features, and exciting events, there's always something new to experience in Eternis: Death Match.

But Eternis is more than just a game; it's a living, breathing world shaped by its passionate community.
Join our Discord community to unlock exclusive behind-the-scenes content, participate in lively discussions, and collaborate with developers to shape the game's future. Your feedback matters, and together, we'll continue to evolve Eternis into the ultimate gaming experience.

Are you ready to write your own legend? Join us in Eternis: Death Match and let the battles begin!

name: Who is the Joker?
description: Who Is The Joker is a horror adventure online multiplayer game. As different identities, find various props and various key clues to find out who is the joker or human. Survive and become a champion. Rich and detailed game scenes and thrilling music effects render the exciting atmosphere. Come and play!

name: The Scroll of Black Loong
description: A brand new Eastern-style parenting-simulator-RPG adventure. After losing all your family, the mysterious scroll you protect grants you a sister. You will accompany her as she grows up and cultivate her. Remember, every decision you make is crucial.

name: Radiosol
description: RADIOSOL is a journey through a desolate world burned by a planetary cataclysm. In search of answers, you will have to navigate through the ruins of megastructures and abandoned cities, avoiding the scorching rays of the Sun.

name: Roy Rattler
description: Roy Rattler is a survival-horror FPS about being trapped in a theme park after a biotech experiment gone wrong brings it's collection of characters to life as murderous mutants! Engage in non-linear exploration and tense combat with limited resources as you search for an escape!

name: Melting Encyclopedia
description: Interactive 3d encyclopedia of alien dimensions

name: Replicore
description: Replicore is a co-op shooter set in an ancient sci-fi world. Transform into your Core to roll, dash or throw your team members into the action or pull them out of tight spots to navigate the challenges of the mysterious ruins. Experience the first true Core-operative gameplay!

name: Fear Tape
description: You are a police officer who needs to investigate an abandoned hospital to remove some invaders, survive the frightening and terrifying environment with your gun and flashlight! Good luck!

name: There is No Plan B
description: 「There is NO PLAN B」 is a 「Narrative Adventure Game」 set in a cyberpunk world. Step into the shoes of B, a Hikikomori private eye, as you meet clients, investigate crime scenes, gather witness testimonies, and even apprehend suspects yourself. Will you be able to unravel the truth behind each case?

name: World of Crypts
description: Welcome human to the World of Crypts! Here, living or perishing is up to you! Essence is everywhere, allowing mortals to reach even the divine.

name: Jötunn's Greed
description: Jötunn's Greed is a fast-paced extraction-looter where you raid villages and grow your clan with the loot you acquire. Build up enough power to take on the giant that wronged your people!

name: Yoru ga Kuru!: Square of the Moon - Remastered
description: Ryou lives a dull life in Otsuna until a red-eyed girl named Izumi invites him to join her fight against the Light Hunters. When the True Moon rises, the Light Hunters descend upon the city, leaving chaos in their wake. Cloaked in the shadows of the night, this story of supernatural suspense begins.

name: Plants vs Animals
description: "Plants vs. Animals" is a TD game where players, as plant summoners, collect and upgrade plant cards against animal waves. Victories yield new cards and genetic materials for card mutation and enhancement.Strategic card play and evolution are key

name: Distant Oceanic Getaway
description: Distant Oceanic Getaway - A Dating Adventure for WLW. You take on the role of Maeve, a heartbroken woman determined to move on from her cheating ex by embarking on this cruise alone. Will Maeve open her heart to new romance and the possibility of finding her soulmate at sea?​​

name: Robin Hood: Shadow of Nottingham
description: Liberate Nottingham from the dark alliances of Prince John as the daring outlaw Robin Hood. Stick to the shadows of the forest, explore the secrets of Nottinghamshire, fight the enemies of King Richard, gain the favor of factioand shape the fate of Nottingham forever. A historical fantasy RPG.

name: Season Changer
description: Embark on an epic journey through ancient Crete, where Greek history and mythology come to life. Solve clever puzzles, explore enchanting landscapes and unravel an exciting story. Join Acacio and discover the magic of the seasons today!

name: Cafe Maid Girls: Cute Kemono Lifeguard DLC
description: Sin descripción

name: The Public Domain: The Game
description: The most ambitious asset flip of all time! A new 2D Platformer with Adventure Game elements created by a single rouge nerd! Every single image and sound in this game is taken from a public domain or royalty free source, including a few familiar faces. . .

name: Figments
description: Embark on a powerful, heartfelt journey in Figments, a third-person action-adventure from VaporLock Labs. Immerse yourself in a hidden world, known only to Henry, where you can explore, craft, and fight to survive. Learn to conquer your deepest fears in this upcoming epic debut title.

name: Dissociative
description: A merging of dissociation between dream worlds. Lost in nightmares. Find your way through the desolate worlds, happy dreams and hidden horrors.

name: Ugaris: The Legend Recovered
description: Welcome, Adventurer, to the enigmatic realms of Astonia. A world brimming with danger and opportunity awaits. Arm yourself with valor and let your powers craft your destiny.

name: Eternal Fate: A Journey Begins
description: Old-school style RPG to enjoy a nostalgic tale with difficult and fair gameplay that is fully voiced.

name: Barro GT: Pack #1
description: Support the Barro series and get 3 extra race tracks to play on.

name: The 13th Floor
description: You are stuck in an infinite loop within a hotel.Keenly observe your surroundings, report any anomalies, confront your fears, and escape the nightmare by reaching your room on the 13th floor.This journey tests your resolve and wits at every turn.

name: The Tennis Academy
description: The Tennis Academy is a solo-developed action fantasy RPG and dating sim. Uncover the mysteries of the castle-like school while fighting wacky tennis duels with hand-drawn 2D animated characters. Live your best college life, rizz up classmates to become your Doubles Partners, and save tennis!

name: Fenix
description:
The story is about Yaga's past, the past and story nobody tells about her and her desires.

Here you gonna help Yaga to get the magical artefact of Kuigorsj, leadead by the feather of a real Fenix.

name: Slavic Gods Rodnoverie
description: Slash dungeon monsters, survive and protect shrine! Upgrade your God powers & support your champion!

name: Shadow of Atlantis
description: Sin descripción

name: Three Verses
description: THREE VERSES is an adventure game / first person dungeoncrawler / typing game based on poetry. Having shed your corporeal form, you must now escape purgatory by completing the simple task of delivering verses from deities to struggling poets.

name: I Am Etheric
description: I Am Etheric is a realistic first-person horror game in which a man with spiritual power visits a small, secluded psychiatric hospital in a town to banish an archon who can travel through different dimensions

name: Infinicrypt
description: Take control of one of 3 mighty heroes to vanquish an evil as old as time. Dodge attacks, slay monsters, and collect items in this bullet-hell dungeon-delving roguelike! Are you ready for the infinite depths?

name: Fallen Kingdom: A Mario PC Port Retake
description: Sin descripción

name: Cyber Sensation: Malware Breakout
description: Sin descripción

name: Sirocco
description: MOBA meets Vampire Survivors in a dynamic 5v5 arena inspired by the legendary Warcraft 3 mod: Battleships. Rally your team as you swap abilities mid-match, load up auto-firing weapons, and craft strategies on the fly in Sirocco. No rules — just fun.

name: Gaia
description: A personal game about the maker's daughter with a link to our world's problems. Gaia is a story-driven platformer that takes the player through the world of Greek Mythology and leaves the player with the feeling that everyone can change the world for the better.

name: Super Spy Academy
description: Join Leo in Super Spy Academy! Uncover a mysterious plot at a prestigious university, solve puzzles, interact with unique characters, and explore diverse areas to save the school from a perilous fate.

name: Cynderfall Cycle
description: A 3d isometric roguelite game. Fight your way through the tower, discover the secrets of Cynderfall, upgrade your strength and use your abilities such as seamlessly switching between Melee and Magic to defeat the final boss.

name: Memora Wanderer
description: Memora Wanderer is a cute nostalgic RPG in which you embark on an adventure in the lands of Memora. With an emphasis on world exploration, item gathering, freedom to level up where you want, and freedom to build your character's class, stats, and skills how you see fit.

name: Avians Against Aviation
description: Play as a bird flying against a hoard of airplanes and other flying machines or creatures in this cartoon themed side-scroller. Eat mosquitos and fight a series of nasty aviators who think the sky is theirs to control. It's either you, or them.

name: Demon Save the World
description: "Demon Save the World" is an action rogue game where you play as a gangster to save the world.

name: Panels
description: Puzzle platformer with a dash of metroidvania and a unique panel switching mechanic.

name: Astral Outcast
description: You've become a spaceship captain who transports supplies to Earth's colony on Mars. On a return trip your ship gets lost on the way back to Earth. Can you find out how to survive in space and get back home?

name: Cyber Seekers: Conquest
description: Shoot, strike and hack machines in a rogue lite sci-fi adventure. Slot new abilities and upgrades in each run and become a superior Cyber Seeker.

name: Moon Samurai
description: Moon Samurai is an intense, engaging action adventure that slips players into the high tops of a young warrior on a mission to defeat a corrupted government in the dangerous lunar city-state of RAM City.

name: Blood Reaver
description: Blood Reaver is a dark fantasy, online, wave-based, FPS where 4 unlikely heroes must restore an ancient order, harnessing the powers of blood magic to stop a demonic invasion sent by the gods of hell - reigniting a timeless war where the fate of their world hangs in the balance.

name: Lost in the Roots
description: A 2D adventure with a twisted story about guilt, where a girl is kidnapped and held in an attic somewhere in the countryside. Why and who took the girl to this godforsaken place? What to do when there is nowhere to run?

name: Dust & Courage: Jake Bolton’s Journey
description: "Dust & Courage: Jake Bolton's Journey" is a historical fantasy RPG set in the Wild West. Play as Jake, a cowboy uncovering secrets and exploring towns. Your choices shape Jake's destiny through quests and tough decisions. Experience compelling and fun stories for a memorable experience.

name: Rapid Fury
description: In Rapid Fury (FPS) you blast the monsters and bosses with a shotgun across four arenas. Choose 20 waves of monsters or endless wave. Level up your skills after each wave. Electronic music helps you maintain your firing rhythm. Master the game and climb the leaderboard to the top. Have a blast!

name: Sand Nomads
description: Sand Nomads is an open world tactical RPG where you lead a team of nomads looking for riches and fame across a massive futuristic sand planet. Explore the world, recruit companions, chase rewards and unravel the mysteries of ancient alien ruins!

name: Datavoid: Catrow
description: Catrow is an action-platform game with an ambiguous design. The world, once as cute as it used to be, has been corrupted by Idito's intrusion into the files. And remember, this game is not about ponies!

name: Leafblade
description: The coziest mix of ARPG and monster tamer. Fight along the Mons you meet in your adventure to recover the bond between humans and Mons. Take care of your Mons in your farm, improving their combat and farm skills while ensuring their happiness.

name: Rug Cleaning Simulator
description: Rug cleaning simulator is cozy, relaxing first person simulator about running small rug cleaning business. You start as a burned out person that leaves corporate job and open rug cleaning business.

name: Home Renovator
description: Embark on your interior design journey in Home Renovator! Transform houses, unlock tools, and fulfill your client’s needs to build your dream home.

name: Ronin Rush
description: Drawing inspiration from classic Hack & Slash, Beat ‘em Up, and SHMUP genres, we introduce our unique "Slice ‘em Up" adventure unfolding in fabled Japan! Navigate this Yokai-infested world utilizing a variety of tools, such as kunai, weapon arts, spirit abilities, and of course, the iconic katana!

name: Brains n' Bullets
description: Brains n' Bullets is the first shooter that lets you improve your school grades while playing. Learn vocabulary and other content by heart while you and your team fight to conquer the bases on tactical maps.

name: Sudoku Acres
description: Sudoku Acres is a cozy cross-up of farm building and puzzle solving. Grow your skills and your environment as you complete Sudoku puzzles, acquire animals, and unlock decorations your farm.

name: Slap Cats
description: Slap Cats is a party game that supports up to 4 players playing in local. You will control little cats in the world of paper and defeat other players to win

name: Soul Surge
description: Soul Surge is a fast-paced roguelite, where speed equals damage. Slide, kick and tear through the seven stages of grief. Evolve your abilities, to confront the root of corruption and emerge victorious?

name: Revload
description: Revload is a couch Co-op arena shooter party game. Controll one of these cute revolver creatures and blast your friends into oblivion.

name: Warehouse Bots
description: Take on the role of a warehouse manager overseeing a bustling hub of automated activity. In this immersive simulator, you'll delve into the intricacies of logistics as you control robots, construct efficient road networks, and fine-tune traffic flow to optimize your warehouse operations.

name: Master of Command: Prussian Glory
description: Step into command during the Seven Years' War with this innovative roguelike historical strategy game. Randomly generated campaigns and real-time battles demand challenging tactical decisions. Customize units and upgrade your force in a game that blends historical depth with unique gameplay.

name: Reclamation of Xanthros
description: Reclamation of Xanthros is a unique Tower-Defense Roguelike. Xeno have taken over the planet Xanthros and you must save it by defeating their Matriarche. Battle across a wide range of biomes with a changing assortment of Towers, Upgrades, and Artifacts. Features a unique turret building mechanic.

name: Tresmir Sight
description: Can you find what you're looking for? Or are you at the mercy of Tisik and her followers? Your words matter in this short game of dialogue.

name: Belly Bumpers
description: Use your belly to knockout other players in this 2-8 online and local party game. Eat juicy burgers to increase the size of your belly or force-feed opponents until they burst. Bump it out in a world of food-themed stages.

name: Shipwrecked: Lost Colony
description: Shipwrecked: Lost Colony is an 18th Century city-survival builder set on a tropical isle lost to time. Lead a group of marooned survivors and forge a new beginning in an uncharted land, where dinosaurs are the biggest threat and your strongest allies.

name: Ravenwood Academy: A Wizard101 Story
description: Step into the role of an outcast student wizard attending Ravenwood Academy and prepare to discover the truth behind the school’s bizarre events. Create connections, investigate mysteries, and drop in for a spell in this storybook-style life sim where your choices matter.

name: Tattered Sails
description: The Golden Age of Piracy, a time when legends are made or torn down. No trip over the seas is safe and every voyage could be your last. Or... You could find riches, power, and become legend!

name: Tavern Ventures: Guilds & Tales
description: Embark on a journey where your tavern becomes the epicenter of adventure and intrigue. Align with guilds, outwit competition, and navigate a world rich with secrets. Your choices craft the narrative of an enchanting fantasy saga, inviting mystery at every turn.

name: Pythonmancer
description: Collect dungeon keys, fight enemies in turn-based combat and find several party members so you can escape a tower that has been overrun by deadly creatures.

name: Quatros Noir
description: Quatros Noir is a fast-paced, fallen blocks, action puzzle game. Stack your blocks in more than one dimension and clear lines along the way. Master the campaign, +20 single modes, local multiplayer and co-op mode.

name: Réussir: Code de la Route - Bonus ASSR 1 - ASSR 2: Permis AM - French Highway Code
description: Sin descripción

name: Pineapple Defense
description: "Pineapple Defense" is an exciting tower defense game where you defend a pineapple farm from attacks by flies and meme characters. Plant pineapples, build cannons, and battle bosses to save the harvest and become a hero of the farming world!

name: Sifera
description: Embark on an adventure in Sifera, a world scarred by 'The Cascade.' Explore vast landscapes, uncover secrets, and engage in challenging combat. Your choices shape the fate of the planet in this epic journey.

name: Squirrel Knight
description: Jump, slash, and race against the clock in this classic action-platformer. Adventure as Squirrel Knight to save the forest and discover powerful magic, deadly enemies and hidden secrets along the way.

name: The Earth Is Flat
description: Help Teddy on his adventure to prove that the Earth is flat and win back his ex-girlfriend. Venture through various countries such as Canada, the US, Brazil, Ireland, Italy and many others. Face crazy scientists, control a Jet Ski, try to reach the Earth's atmosphere with balloons, and more.

name: PC Futbol 8
description: The wait is over! The legendary Spanish football management video game, PC Fútbol, is back after many years with new dynamics and the classic spirit!

name: I Witness
description: I Witness is a 2-player online co-op psychological horror game that follows a sibling whose curiosity leads them to investigate a neighbor suspected of being a serial killer who, unbeknownst to them, hides a disturbing desire.

name: WattGames
description: Turn your indoor cycling into an adventure! A new revolution in fitness gaming, WATTGAMES is the first-ever indoor cycling game that lets you do battle with fearsome enemies, explore a beautifully crafted world and complete missions through exercise. Ride for your life!

name: Thor's Legacy
description: A new type of roguelike deck-builder that's made to be as flexible and customizable as possible, without losing the difficulty that makes it worth pursuing. Survive for as long as you can against an endless wave of enemies, that come back stronger each time you beat them.

name: When The World Became Black
description: You play as 07, who wakes up with strange powers in a post-apocalyptic future. Your choice changes the story! Do you become the lost hero? Or do you become something to fear?

name: Step into the Abyss
description: Step into the Abyss is a detective adventure that combines an intriguing, branching storyline, forcing the player to constantly make choices, and a dystopian world ruled by dictatorship. The noir style adds charm, and the unusual approach to gameplay will provide you with a unique gaming experience.

name: Time Journey
description: This game is perfect for players who relish sci-fi mysteries, engaging storylines, and intellectual challenges. "Time Journey" invites you to decipher the secrets of your identity and the alien lab, making every discovery a step closer to the truth.

name: The Last Oasis Before Chastity
description: Amidst the barren desert, an oasis shines like a beacon of hope, accessible only by a solitary road. The scorching sands loom on one side, while the weight of the past hangs heavy on the other. It’s a place where one can escape the harsh realities, but also confront them.

name: Nanuka: Secret of the Shattering Moon
description: A new exciting cinematic 2D puzzle platformer set in a colourful cartoony land. Nanuka is utterly unprepared for the adventure ahead. She has to use her martial art combat skills to defeat quirky foes while making friends that will be key to uncovering the secret of the shattering moon.

name: Hoodies Squad: Alcoholypse
description: In Grochow, something strange is causing the residents to behave abnormally. Three inseparable buddies must restore balance by discovering the causes of this confusion and heading deep into the mysterious Alkoholipsa. Will they succeed in restoring normalcy before the neighborhood collapses?

name: Custom Order Maid 3D2: It's a Night Magic Spring Full Swing All In Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Monolit
description: Monolit is a cooperative, real-time and tile-based multiplayer survival game where your main goal is to develop your base camp, survive waves of incoming enemies and defeat bosses in an unknown and mysterious world.

name: The Backworlds
description: RUN, JUMP, ESCAPE. Endlessly high buildings of dead ruins are towering over a giant chasm of green mist. But the reality of our world is seeping in, and some familiar places are now stuck there. This is how you are invited there - against your will. Enter the hostile realm of the BACKWORLDS.

name: Polygonal Passage
description: A low-poly version based on the well-known puzzle game Portal! For people who are bored and just want a casual puzzle experience.

name: Terunyan to Amanoiwato
description: Terunyan to Amanoiwato is a rhythm game in which Terunyan wanders around and collects elementals. Elementals can be efficiently gathered by collecting them in rhythm to the music.

name: Bolt Runner
description: Take control of a robot soldier on the run from a ruined future as you travel through time portals to prevent a dystopian reality!

name: Skate O'Clock
description: Skate O'Clock is dynamic, action, skateboarding game in retro style. Win the race against time by collecting coins through multiple levels.

name: Wallbound
description: Welcome to Wallbound. You have been trapped in Chamber 7, with little chance of escape. Wallbound is an FPS Parkor-style game, where you can run, jump, slide past all the obstacles and get to the exit. Good Luck!

name: Mouse World
description: You are a human who has been transformed into a rat. Your objective is to find your human body in this RPG game in a medieval world. You will have to survive all the dangers that may arise along your way.

name: Please Insert Disc
description: Please Insert Disc is a puzzle horror game about navigating the underbelly of a 2000's era gaming console in an attempt to restore its functionality. From the creators of Home Safety Hotline.

name: Shimapanzer Strike!
description: At Knight's Cross Academy, the most prestigious military academy on the continent of Lykaia, you will learn the military tactics needed to effectively command your squad of tanks, infantry, and magical girls to defeat a ruthless enemy only interested in the total subjugation of your world and race.

name: Quick Cast Chaos
description: An unlikely hero ventures across a magical kingdom to defeat the monstrous Moon Menace and rescue the Star Sovereign.

name: Pirates: Rogue's Fortune
description: Pirates: Rise of Thieves is a roguelite exploration and survival game. You're a pirate who explores the seabed to find as many resources as possible, before having to go up to defend his boat from attacks. You have access to a multitude of improvements to optimize each of your run.

name: Moon War Meta
description: An open world space action RPG adventure that can be played both alone and together.

name: Skeleton Scramble Deluxe 2
description: Skeleton Scramble Deluxe 2 is a fast-paced tower defense/strategy hybrid. Choose from a variety of factions and classes, each with numerous viable strategies, and battle against your friends or CPU players in fierce 5-10 minute battles.

name: Limitless
description: LIMITLESS is a free-to-play PvP arena shooter where players master dynamic movement mechanics, utilizing grappling hooks to outmaneuver opponents in fast-paced battles.

name: Beat Saber: Daft Punk - "Da Funk / Daftendirekt"
description: Get the track ‘Da Funk / Daftendirekt’ by Daft Punk on Beat Saber now. This track is part of Daft Punk Music Pack.
